pageContext.claim: “Six months in, TAX CUTS are already providing historic gains for minorities, women, and small businesses”
pageContext.analysis: Trump isn't specific about which gains minorities, women and small business have seen. He inherited a strong economy from Obama and so is giving himself too much credit. With about 126 million full-time workers in the United States, only about 5% have received these one-time bonuses. The unemployment rate has been steadily declining since 2010, but wages have haven't grown at the same rate.
